p: The pangolin CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are more than 92% similar at amino acid levels. Thus, using pangolin coronavirus as a model, three drugs, namely, cepharanthine (CEP), selamectin, and mefloquine hydrochloride, were observed to possess anti-SARS-CoV-2 activity with complete blocking of cell cytopathic effects [ 177].
